author: Anne
text:
“The Real Real”?  More like “The Wrong Wrong”.   I purchased Stuart Weitzman brown suede boots that were listed for final sale as a size 8. But the shoes I received were most definitely not size 8 - they’re at least two sizes smaller.  

I emailed customer service for guidance on my options for return/refund, since I did not get the item I believed I was paying for.  

I got an email back, probably from a bot, that said I would not be getting any kind of refund because the shoes were listed as “final sale”. 
I wrote back and said this reply is unacceptable since the purchase I made was for a Size 8 shoe - it was posted for sale as such and the expectation is that I would receive the Size 8 shoe.   I did not receive the Size 8 - the shoes are unusable.  

The only fair and reasonable action would be to allow me to return the shoes, at TRR’s expense, and either refund my payment money, or give me store credit.  

I have not heard back from TRR, which tells me they don’t care, and essentially did a bait and switch.  Buyers beware. And TRR beware: there are probably many other clients who’ve experienced the same situation and cold customer service.   It’s how class action lawsuits are born…
title: Beware of the Bait and Switch

text: I made my purchase based upon how the item was showcased/advertised and was pleased with what I saw. However, when I received the much wanted item, the shoes were so worn out that I would have had to have the soles replaced and the tip of the shoes were worn out. author: JUSTWANTEDNEWBOOTS
text: I RECEIVED THE WRONG SIZE BOOTS.  I WAS DISAPPOINTED BUT, HEY, ACCIDENTS HAPPEN.  I LOOK ON THE WEBSITE FOR RETURNS AND FIND OUT I HAVE 15 DAYS, THE PACKAGE ARRIVED LATE DUE TO SNOW STORMS AND BY THE TIME I RECEIVED THE PACKAGE ONLY 7 DAYS REMAINED.  THEN I NOTICE THEY WILL CHARGE $12 FOR RETURNS.  I DIDN'T THINK I SHOULD HAVE TO PAY BECAUSE IT WAS THERE FAULT, NOT MINE.  SO I CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE.  40 MINUTES LATER AND BEING DISCONNECTED TWICE I HADNT GOTTEN ANYWHERE.  EVERYTIME I CALLED BACK OR WAS TRANSFERRED I HAD TO GIVE THEM MY ORDER NUMBER, PRODUCT NUMBER, NAME, ADDRESS, BILLING ADDRESS.  SO AFTER THE SECOND DISCONNECT, I GO TO MY OFFICE AND THINK IT WILL BE EASIER TO "CHAT"  SAME THING!!  ORDER NUMBER, PRODUCT NUMBER, NAME, ADDRESS, BILLING ADDRESS.  COMPUTER, THEN PERSON, THEN NEW PERSON.  THEY FINALLY AGREED TO WAIVE THE $12 RETURN FEE.  I HAVE NO FAITH IN TRR.  IF THEY CAN BE TRUSTED TO VERIFY A SIZE, HOW CAN I TRUST THEM TO AUTHENTICATE A PRODUCT.  VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.  I NEVER LEAVE BAD REVIEWS BUT THIS REALLY PISSED ME OFF.  I HAD TO GET TO THE AIRPORT TONIGHT BUT FIRST I HAD TO GET A RETURN LABEL, GO WAY OUT OF MY WAY TO THE UPS STORE TONIGHT BECAUSE IF I WAITED UNTIL I GOT BACK THE 15 DAYS WOULD HAVE PASSED.  WELL, NOW IM AT THE AIRPORT AND HAVE TIME TO TELL EVERYONE WHAT A $*++SHOW THIS WAS
title: HOW CAN THEY VERIFY AUTHENTICITY WHEN THEY CANT VERIFY SIZE
